title: Coal mining in Minnesota
summary: This rule will create more regulations for coal mines, requiring them to pay their workers with diamonds, for all midwestern states.

title: Water conservation in Arizona
summary: This rule mandates new water-saving technologies for all agricultural businesses in Arizona.

title: Renewable energy incentives in Texas
summary: This rule provides tax breaks for companies investing in solar and wind energy in Texas.

title: Wildlife protection in Alaska
summary: This rule increases protected areas for endangered species in Alaska.

title: Urban transportation upgrades in New York
summary: This rule funds new subway lines and electric bus fleets in New York City.
